The benefits of R&D and learning
doing are larger at the economy level than at the firms level
. As a result, the market, left to its own, tends to generate less investment
instance, if the cost of a technology is too high before a large amount of
doing has occurred, there is a risk that it will not be adopted by the market even if it is
economically advantageous for the society. Indeed, initially new technologie
cannot compete with the incumbent technologies

doing to a level sufficient to beat the incumbent technology

The failure of markets to deliver the size of R&D investment and learning

egorized as technology push and demand pull policies. The role of these policies is
